title: Templates
description: Here you can choose a template or create a template to ask additional questions, request documents or provide information about the company.

required_documents.title: Documents required from the candidate
required_documents.description: Create or select the documents to be requested from the applicant.

additional_information.title: Additional information required from the candidate
additional_information.description: Create or select the additional questions you want to ask the candidate.

alertMessage.create_template: You are sure you want to create the template.
alertMessage.update_template: You are sure you want to update the template.
alertMessage.delete_template: You are sure you want to delete the template.
